title: Two elderly Dalit farmers fighting case against TN BJP leader, summoned by ED
selftext: The ED is alleged to be pursuing the Dalit farmers – who subsist on a Rs 1,000 monthly pension – as they are engaged in a land dispute case, where they have accused a local BJP leader of trying to illegally grab their land.
comments: LMAO the BJP ain't even trying to hide it anymore
IT Cell rapists coming in to defend anytime soon.
